meanings.definition: A smaller division or part of a larger zone or area.
meanings.sent1: The city was divided into subzones for better organization.
meanings.sent2: The map showed different subzones for residential and commercial areas.
meanings.sent3: The subzones of the park were like tiny puzzle pieces waiting to be put together.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, each group represented a subzone of the larger learning environment.
meanings.sent5: The subzones of the garden were filled with colorful flowers and buzzing bees.

meanings.definition: To divide into smaller zones or areas.
meanings.sent1: The urban planner decided to subzones the city for easier management.
meanings.sent2: She carefully subzones the land into sections for different purposes.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully subzones the ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent4: His mind subzones the problem into smaller, more manageable parts.
meanings.sent5: The artist subzones the canvas into distinct sections before painting.
